answers.answer: It cannot harm the baby at all....All it is is a blood draw.....Don't worry...The only thing is that if you do have gestational diabetes, it probably should have been addressed earlier (at the previous appt. that you had)....but certainly do not stress about the test...it's a breeze!
Thank you very much, that is all i needed to know :)

question: Is it still ok to have the sugar test done at 34 weeks? I had an appointment to get it done earlier but was not able to keep it. I called for another appointment the other day and it is set for friday but I didnt even think about the fact that I might be too far along. Is it safe? I am sure once I get to the doctor they will ask me how far along I am and tell me rather or not it is, but I thought maybe I could save time and find out sooner.ThanksJennifer
title: Sugar Test at 34 weeks???
